strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use XMLHttpRequest to download and show an image
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT: XMLHttpRequest Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget goes online to download and display the Google logo. This is all done using the provided XMLHttpRequest object.
